abstract.para: Vertical profiles of temperature, pH, alkalinity, dissolved oxygen, dissolved ammonium, dissolved reactive phosphate, primary production, chlorophyll, and particulate carbon and nitrogen at the Limno Bay station, Toolik Lake.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications
A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: 21Apr91 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Julie Pallant DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: Julie Pallant DATE: 4Oct91

para.literalLayout: Water samples were collected with a pump at depths of 1.0 and 3.5 m. Dissolved oxygen was measured via Winkler titration. Alkalinity was measured by acid titration. Primary production was measured by the C-14 technique using 24 hour incubations at a depth of 1 m. Water was filtered through 47 mm diameter glass fiber filters. Filters were dried. Carbon and nitrogen were measured by combustion of filters in a Perkin Elmer CHN elemental analyzer. Phosphorus was measured by colorimetric analyses after extraction of phosphorus from filter with hot hydrochloric acid. Another set of filters was not dried but were used for chlorophyll analyses. Filters were extracted with cold acetone, and chlorophyll was maesured with a flourometer. Temperature was measured with a mercury thermometer.
Notes: These data were collected as reference samples for the limnocorral N-15 fertilization experiments of 1989-1990.

Variable Variable descrip. Precis./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE site of measurement y DATE Date DDMMMYY n D/D meters below lake surface 0.1 m n TEMP water temperature 0.1 C n BLANK pH pH 0.1 pH units n BLANK ALK alkalinity 0.01 mequiv/L n BLANK OXY dissolved oxygen 3 micromoles/L n BLANK NH4 dissolved ammonium 0.05 micromoles/L n BLANK PO4 dissolved phosphate 0.05 micromoles/L n BLANK PC particulate carbon 0.1 micromoles/L n BLANK PN particulate nitrogen 0.1 micromoles/L n BLANK PROD primary production 0.2 micromoles C/L/dy n BLANK CHLA chlorophyll 0.2 micrograms/L n BLANK COMMENTS notes about data n (12) CALCULATIONS Variable Formula
